body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 40 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Benjamin Jenkins and the customer's name is Ashley Bryant.  The conversation is about a random business (a Coffee Shop ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, welcome to Brewed Awakening Coffee Shop! My name is Benjamin Jenkins, and I'm here to assist you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Benjamin, I'm Ashley Bryant. I'm glad to speak with you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Wonderful to meet you, Ashley! How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question regarding my last billing statement. I think there might be an error.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m sorry to hear that, Ashley. I’d be happy to look into it for you. Can you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Just to verify, could you also provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s ashley.bryant@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! I appreciate your patience, Ashley. I'll check the details of your billing statement.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thanks, I really hope everything’s okay.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concerns. It’s important to ensure everything is correct.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Exactly! I noticed there were extra charges that I don't recognize.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Let me take a quick look at your past transactions.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Okay, that would be great. I really enjoy your coffee shop, so I hope it’s just a mistake.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can see here that there were additional charges from a few extra purchases. Would you like me to help you with the details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, please. I can’t remember ordering those.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It looks like there were two purchases of our premium blend coffee on the same day. Would you recall that experience?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I don’t think I did that. Two purchases sound a bit excessive, don’t you think?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I agree, it might have been an error. I can help you dispute that charge if you’d like.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, that would be helpful! I really want to clarify this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: No problem, Ashley. I’ll initiate the billing dispute. We will send you a confirmation email shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Oh, that sounds good to me! Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You’re welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that’s it for now. You’ve been very helpful.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your kind words. It’s always my pleasure to assist customers like you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Benjamin.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: If you have further questions, don’t hesitate to reach out.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I won’t. Thanks once again for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Ashley. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: You too, goodbye!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Goodbye!
